title: Comprehensive approach integrating remote sensing, machine learning, and physicochemical parameters to detect hydrodynamic conditions and groundwater quality deterioration in non-rechargeable aquifer systems
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Mohamed Hamdy Eid, Ali Shebl, Mustafa Eissa, Essam A. Mohamed, Amr S. Fahil, Hatem Saad Ramadan, Mostafa R. Abukhadra, Ahmed M. El-Sherbeeny, Attila Kovacs, Péter Szűcs
